Notes: An area that can kill the player and compatible objects when entered.

Obj_arg0.Name: Death Type
Obj_arg0.Description: Specifies what objects this area affects.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement hwhen this switch is activated.

BaseMtxFollower.Description: Objects of this class can follow another BaseMtxFollowTarget object.
